options.content:
This dashboard helps visualize Application Signals information from AWS.
For more information about Application Signals and how to enable it, see the [AWS Application Signals docs](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudWatch/latest/monitoring/CloudWatch-Application-Monitoring-Sections.html).

To get started with this dashboard, select the appropriate `appSignalsDatasource`, `cloudwatchDatasource`, and `region` in the variables above. You can use the `account` dropdown to further narrow down the list of services.

Use the hyperlinks in the `List Services` panel to update the board with the Service you are examining, and you can use the links in the collapsed boards below to examine an Operation or Dependency of that service.
